players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
You: "I saw Charlie talking to someone near the well last night. It might be relevant."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's the mafioso. Keep an eye on him."
Bob: "I am the mafioso, but I didn't kill Charlie. Alice saw him talking to someone near the well last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
